schema.name: Greek Yogurt Vinaigrette

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and mince the garlic clove.
In a mixing bowl, whisk together the Greek yogurt, minced garlic, and cane vinegar until well combined.
Taste the vinaigrette, and adjust seasoning if necessary. If the dressing is too thick, you can thin it out with a little bit of water or more vinegar to achieve your desired consistency.
Transfer the vinaigrette to an airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use.

schema.description: This Greek Yogurt Vinaigrette is a health-conscious choice for those looking for a tasty, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar dressing option. Perfect for adding a delicious zest to your salads while keeping things light and healthy!
